snippet: With the chairmanship of the Senate Armed Services Committee almost certain to go to him, Senator John McCain will have a bully pulpit for his foreign-policy disputes with the White House.
abstract: Sen John McCain is expected to assume chairmanship of the Senate Armed Services Committee, appointment that would position him to challenge Pres Obama on his handling of overseas conflicts, including war on Islamic State.
lead_paragraph: With the chairmanship of the Senate Armed Services Committee almost certain to go to him, Senator John McCain will have a bully pulpit for his foreign-policy disputes with the White House.

headline.main: McCain Poised to Press Obama, and Pentagon, at Armed Services Helm
headline.print_headline: McCain Poised to Press Obama, and Pentagon, at Armed Services Helm
